mapper.select: SELECT idPago, DATE_FORMAT(fechaPago,'%d/%m%Y') AS fechaPago, c.idCliente, monto, p.idTipoPago, p.descuento, CONCAT(c.nombre,' ', c.apellidoPaterno, ' ', c.apellidoMaterno) AS cliente, t.pago AS tipoPago, CONCAT(t.descuento,'%') AS porcentajeDescuento FROM pago p INNER JOIN cliente c ON c.idCliente= p.idCliente INNER JOIN tipoPago t ON t.idTipoPago = p.idTipoPago;

SELECT idPago, DATE_FORMAT(fechaPago,'%d/%m%Y') AS fechaPago, c.idCliente, monto, p.idTipoPago, p.descuento, CONCAT(c.nombre,' ', c.apellidoPaterno, ' ', c.apellidoMaterno) AS cliente, t.pago AS tipoPago, CONCAT(t.descuento,'%') AS porcentajeDescuento FROM pago p INNER JOIN cliente c ON c.idCliente= p.idCliente INNER JOIN tipoPago t ON t.idTipoPago = p.idTipoPago WHERE p.idCliente = #{idCliente};
